tasks.label: Setup Project Structure
tasks.command: mkdir -p src/{components,utils,monitoring,sandbox} public assets docs tests && mkdir -p src/components/{dashboard,charts,comparison} && echo 'Project structure created'

tasks.label: Install Core Dependencies
tasks.command: npm install react react-dom recharts tailwindcss pidusage express cors

tasks.label: Install Dev Dependencies
tasks.command: npm install -D @vitejs/plugin-react vite typescript @types/react @types/react-dom @types/node eslint prettier jest @testing-library/react @testing-library/jest-dom playwright

tasks.label: Setup Vite Config
tasks.command: touch vite.config.js && echo 'Vite config file created'

tasks.label: Setup Tailwind CSS
tasks.command: npx tailwindcss init -p && echo 'Tailwind CSS initialized'

tasks.label: Create Core Files
tasks.command: touch src/main.jsx src/App.jsx src/index.css public/index.html && echo 'Core files created'
